text: John Mackay (; 1656–1754), known as (The Blind Piper), was a Scottish Gaelic poet and composer, and the grandfather of William Ross. ==References== Category:17th-century Scottish Gaelic poets Category:18th-century Scottish Gaelic poets Category:Scottish composers Category:People from Ross and Cromarty Category:1656 births Category:1754 deaths
title: John Mackay (poet)
